faqs.title: Frequently asked {{highlight}}
faqs.subtitle: Answers to the most common questions about our training programs

questions.question: How long do the training programs last?
questions.answer: It varies by program: intensive workshops of 1-2 days, courses of 4-8 weeks, and executive programs of 3-6 months with flexible modalities.

questions.question: Do I need prior knowledge in technology?
questions.answer: No, we design programs for all levels. From fundamentals for beginners to advanced specializations for experts.

questions.question: Are the courses in-person or online?
questions.answer: We offer hybrid modalities: live virtual sessions, in-person workshops and on-demand content for maximum flexibility.

questions.question: Do they include official certification?
questions.answer: Yes, all our programs include verifiable digital certification recognized by the industry upon successful completion.

questions.question: Is there follow-up after the course?
questions.answer: We include 3 months of post-training mentoring, access to Alumni community and lifetime content updates.

questions.question: Do you offer customized training for companies?
questions.answer: Yes, we design in-company programs adapted to specific needs, organizational culture and business objectives.
